name: Cider.
description:
"The worst loneliness is to not be comfortable with yourself" - John Doe

What - : Cider. is a short narrative experience made over several afternoons post wage cage. Join two free spirits as they contemplate their place  within society. Hear their stories as they travel along the Kapiti Coast to Wellington City each in search of  themselves.

Controls -

w,a,s,dmovementmouselook aroundEInteract 

Why - This was a personal improvement project made for Robert Yang's Gay Western Jam. The aim was to further familiarize myself with UE4 and its various aspects.

p.s the main menu random generates the field so I'm sorry if a tree attacks the screen.

Who -

Liam Knight-Devlin  (@violet_neon)Everything

Disclaimer - I am not a writer or narrative expert nor do I claim to understand the struggle of gay cowboys in 1890's New Zealand.
